snippet.title: Boogaard fans plan public memorial Sunday at Xcel
snippet.description: to the Facebook page, fans will bring candles and their favorite memories to share. The Star Tribune reports the memorial will take place at Gate 1, and that Boogaard's family members were so touched they plan to attend. The family is asking for privacy. Boogaard played for Minnesota from 2005-2010, then signed with the New York Rangers....
